Package model

Class Play

java.lang.Object
model.Play
public class Play extends Object
The Play class represents play objects. The user can create plays to push to the database, and we can construct play objects from the Play table in the database to work with in Java
Author:
Conan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Play()
    Empty constructor for the Play class
    Play(int playId, String playTitle, int playType, String playDescription, String playTime, String playDate, String playDuration, int playCirclePrice, int playStallsPrice, String playLanguage, int playMusicalAccompaniment)
    Database facing constructor allows us to create Play objects from the Play table in the database to work with in java
    Play(String playTitle, int playType, String playDescription, String playTime, String playDate, String playDuration, int playCirclePrice, int playStallsPrice, String playLanguage, int playMusicalAccompaniment)
    User facing constructor, allows the user to create Play objects which can be pushed to the Play table in database
